Sat, 15 Jun 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Wanted man Tom Phillips has evaded capture since disappearing with his three young kids, from left, Ember, Jayda and Maverick in December 2021. This month, police offered an $80,000 reward for information leading to the safe recovery of the children.
